biotools.summary:
an ultra-efficient cloud-based pipeline for mapping allele-specific DNA methylation.

Last updated: July 31, 2020. Please check our preprint on biorxiv and our published paper on Bioinformatics.

Med Google Cloud Platform kan du oprette, implementere og skalere apps, websites og tjenester på den samme infrastruktur som Google.

Fortsæt til Google Cloud Platform.

Skriv den tekst, du hører eller ser.

To be able use CloudASM, you need to create an account on https://cloud.google.com/ and set up how you want to be billed (e.g. with a credit card). As of January 2020, GCP offers $300 in credits for opening an account -- which is enough to test this pipeline.
